title: Rooscier Women's Mesh Dress Short Sleeve Bodycon 3 Piece Outfits with Cami Shorts
description: Fabric: Mesh dress for women is light-weight, breathable, soft touching, stretchy, very comfortable. This suits is included mesh cover up midi dress + vest + shorts.

Features: Short sleeve mini dress are easy to put on and take off, features with mesh, sexy bodycon dress, 3 piece suit, mock neck, mini length, crop cami top, slim fit shorts, when you wear the dress you will be the sparkliest and shiniest one in the crowd.

Match: Bodycon dress perfectly match with heels, hat, necklaces, bracelets, glasses, belts and other accessories for a stylish look, you can also go well with other clothes, such as coat, shirt, definitely pragmatic and sexy in daily.

Occasions: 3 piece dress for women are perfect for party, club, night out, nightclub, clubwear, bars, casual, daily wear, cocktail, prom, dating, dinner, homecoming, evening events, specially occasion, birthday, vacation, beach, going out, new year eve day, concert outfits etc.
Please check the Rooscier's size chart carefully before placing purchase and hope you can order the perfect size for yourself.
